snippet: An eclectic Asian menu and Asian antiques.
abstract: An eclectic Asian menu and Asian antiques.
lead_paragraph: At his restaurant Talde, opening in Park Slope, Brooklyn, on Sunday, Dale Talde has put together an eclectic Asian menu, with barbecued pork shoulder served with smoked miso, and pad thai with crispy fried oysters and Benton's bacon.

headline.main: At Talde in Park Slope, Miso and Barbecue
